question:
Consider the following statements about GST Council:
  1. Finance Minister from each state will be member of the Council
  2. Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of NITI Aayog will be the ex-officio Secretary to the GST Council
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is correct. Second statement is incorrect because Revenue Secretary will be the ex-officio Secretary to the GST Council.
